auto_proceed.description: Never pause between tasks or steps. Display plan and continue immediately. The user can interrupt if needed â€” the default is to keep building.

milestone_pause.description: When true, pause after each milestone review for user acknowledgment. When false, continue straight to the next milestone after review passes (or after fixes if FIXABLE). BLOCKED milestones always pause regardless of this setting.

deferred_auto_action.description: What to do with deferred findings at milestone boundaries when milestone_pause is false. Options: 'promote' (auto-add all as tasks), 'defer' (auto-defer all to post-v1), 'ask' (always ask user regardless of milestone_pause), 'preview' (display findings then auto-promote without pausing).

runtime_qa_pause.description: When true, pause after runtime QA results for user review before /retro. When false, write findings to observations.md and proceed to /retro automatically.

qa_fix_pass.description: Controls the end-of-queue verification fix pass. Runs after all tasks complete: full test suite (always) + browser QA (if web UI) + style audit (if style-guide.md). CRITICAL findings always fixed. major_action controls MAJOR findings: 'fix' (fix them), 'defer' (auto-defer to post-v1), 'ask' (ask user per finding). max_cycles = max fix-and-reverify cycles (default 3). Cycle counting: cycle 1 = first fix attempt + re-verification; cycle 2 = second fix attempt if new issues found; max_cycles=3 means up to 3 fix attempts total. The initial verification that discovers findings is NOT counted as a cycle.
